title: Universal homeomorphism
summary: In algebraic geometry, a universal homeomorphism is a morphism of schemes f : X → Y {\displaystyle f:X\to Y} such that, for each morphism Y ′ → Y {\displaystyle Y'\to Y} , the base change X × Y Y ′ → Y ′ {\displaystyle X\times _{Y}Y'\to Y'} is a homeomorphism of topological spaces.
